From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

After driving out a few miles, he stops, and transformes.
Useing his special telescoptic optic sensors(As seen in TF:TM) he picks
up all the bots heading for the base.
He opens a comm.
"Kluster, its Hot Rod. Those Maxi's out there are heading for the CF.
And they have a blasted Alliance batalian after them. Prepare the base
for a massive assualt."
He transformes back to car mode, and heads back to the CF. He would make
his stand there.
